snippet.title: Spy Hunter - PS Vita Official trailer
snippet.description:
Turn your PS Vita into a secret agent's most valuable weapon.

- Take the wheel of the high-tech Interceptor supercar as the Agent, and tackle a shadowy organisation set on world domination.

- Seamlessly transform your vehicle from high-performance car to off-road assault vehicle to speed boat in perilous missions.

- Upgrade the Interceptor's weapons and gadgets to suit the mission you're about to embark on.
